channel.title: Help please
channel.description: if im not mistaking...well i got moparscape to work but...i have the moparscape thing up and u can put in username password and server ip...i put in all 3..there is no ip for moparscape right, thats what i heard like that u can put in any ip u want..and then is says like error connecting to server...if im not mistaking theres like a bug or the server is down or just some1s updating it....if one of those things is hapening am i still able to play when its over or do i have to re download moparscape?

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @The_Bumclak The Bumclak
item.description:
@The_Bumclak wrote:

you dont have to redownload moparscape,and you cant put any ip you want,the normal ip for moparscape is 127.0.0.1 so when you put your user name and password in just click cancel and start server and you should be logged in.

hope that helped not too complicated is it?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please

item.description:
